sentences: Billy Greer (born January 26, 1952) is an American musician, singer and songwriter known as the current bass guitarist for the band Kansas.
He joined the band in their 1985 reformation, making his debut appearance on Power.
He had previously worked with Kansas keyboardist/vocalist Steve Walsh in the band Streets, and works with his own band Seventh Key when not performing with Kansas.
He also was a member of the 2009 Kansas side project "Native Window" along with Kansas members Phil Ehart, Richard Williams, and David Ragsdale.
In addition to performing, Greer manages his son's band "3 Story Fall" and produces their music.
